infpp.oceanlife.Controller

Class MouseListenerEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • infpp.oceanlife.Controller.MouseListenerEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MouseListenerEx
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    MouseListener Class for all button events in the OceanGui mainly to handle clicked buttons.
    Author:
    Baris Simonjan, Etienne Violet
